name: insta-checker-sdk
description: A robust, production-ready Instagram username availability checker written in TypeScript.
author: Abdou-da0wew <aabdouaydev911@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun x tsc && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format cjs && echo 'const InstaChecker = require("./InstaChecker.cjs"); module.exports = InstaChecker; module.exports.default = InstaChecker;' > dist/index.cjs && mv dist/InstaChecker.js dist/InstaChecker.cjs
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
